DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate surgery-related bleeding mortality patient need acute coronary artery bypass graft without valve replacement dual antiplatelet therapy aspirin P2Y12 receptor blocker ( Clopidogrel , Prasugrel , Ticagrelor )
